metadata.title: CVE-2018-1114 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: It was found that URLResource.getLastModified() in Undertow closes the file descriptors only when they are finalized which can cause file descriptors to exhaust. This leads to a file handler leak.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
